item.title: Getting started with Jupyter
item.description: This page is the first post in a series of introductory python tutorials: 1. Installing Python using Conda 2. Getting started with Jupyter - this tutorial 3. [Using Python packages]() 4. [Working with data]() 5. [Making figures in Python]() To begin using Python, w
